alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 3:30PM AKST until November 30 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with blizzard conditions at times. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. Visibility less than one quarter mile at times. Winds gusting to 50 mph. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts may form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility are expected tonight.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
